price: Dios maldice a los que rechazan el Mensaje y les ha preparado el Infierno.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ سَعِيرًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha laʿana al-kāfirīna wa-aʿadda lahum saʿīran
